title: Maroneia Cave
description: A cave located on mount Ismaros near the ancient settlement of Maroneia in Aegean Thrace. The cave was in human use from the late Neolithic period until the abandonment of the fortified settlement in the 13th century CE. The cave is known locally as "The Cave of Polyphemos" or "The Cave of the Cyclops".

properties.description: Central point determined in Google Earth on the basis of imagery, as well as geolocated photographs available through Google Earth in 2023. Dates after Panti.
properties.title: Imagery Location of cave (central point)
